reviews:
I needed a good quality light for work and did some research which said to get at least 1,000 lumens. So that’s what I did, and it’s overkill. Luckily it’s dimable. On the medium setting I can light up an object almost 100 yards away, and I mean light it completely up, not just cast a dim light on it. Probably perfect for police or rescue work.
The only thing I don’t like is the beam doesn’t adjust, but I’m use to it. The rechargeable battery seems to last a long time as long as I keep it off the highest output setting. Overall a good buy I’m happy with.
product_name: NiteCore MH25 CREE XM-L U2 LED 960 Lumens USB Rechargeable Flashlight, 18650 Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery, USB Charging Cable and Holster, Black
rank:
#272,481 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)
#2,446 in Handheld Flashlights

reviews:
It's bright but my love with the flashlight ended shortly after the return window.

The switch from Turbo to User Defined does not feel natural and takes 2 hands to do so -- which isn't always ideal.
After about 30 days the flashlight started to flicker from time to time and even turn off even though it was fully charged. Apparently, it's something that is pretty common with newer NiteCores. Would love to return or exchange it but I think I have to now go through the warranty. I have since upgraded to an OLight Warrior X Pro which seems to be better quality meets my needs better.

Also, mine did not come with the Edison Bright Batteries.
product_name: NiteCore MH25 CREE XM-L U2 LED 960 Lumens USB Rechargeable Flashlight, 18650 Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery, USB Charging Cable and Holster, Black

reviews: Bright! The selection of the modes is a little tricky to get the light to "stay" on the mode selected. It has to do a lot with how fast you push the tail cap button. That aside, the high mode is insanely bright for a flashlight of it's size. It comes with a holster and lanyard. review_title: Great Product with a few flaws
reviews: I purchased this product both for work but also to be used at home. I am visually impaired and was looking for a super bright flashlight which was durable and long lasting. I chose a tactical flashlight for this reason. The product works excellent and well worth the money that I spent. The CR123 batteries that were in the box work fine and so did the rechargeable battery pack that was included. The battery pack worked on high power for only a short time. I did what anyone else would do - I plugged up the USB cable and attempted to charge the light. I used the included USB cable in addition to several that I keep around my office and the light barely gets a charge at all! I was going to attempt to just exchange the item as I really love the product, but Amazon does not offer an option so I now search ways to rectify the situation!
product_name: NiteCore MH25 CREE XM-L U2 LED 960 Lumens USB Rechargeable Flashlight, 18650 Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery, USB Charging Cable and Holster, Black
rank:
#272,481 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)

review_title: Amazing Flashlight, Incredible Features, Better Price
reviews: This is one amazing flashlight. For those who are familiar with top of the line flashlights, these are about half as much as a Streamlight. But they are also twice as bright! It comes with lots of fun accessories, including a new switch/button and other stuff. And my personal favorite... It charges with a standard mini USB cable... ya know, the same kind that 95% of phones charge with! So if you have a cell phone, you can charge it off any of those cords. I can charge my awesome flashlight in my car! Couldn't be happier!
